input_text:
Job Title: Marketing Assistant

Location: Springfield, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, Advertising, Marketing

Description:
iWorld Professionals is seeking a Marketing Assistant for our client in Springfield, NJ, This is an excellent opportunity for someone looking to kickstart their career in marketing, has a passion for building documents and presentation materials in Adobe, Photoshop and other marketing tools. 
Marketing Assistant Position Overview: We are seeking a highly motivated Marketing Assistant to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will possess strong familiarity with Adobe Creative Suite, particularly Photoshop, and have the ability to create compelling documents and business proposals to support our client's construction business.
Marketing Assistant Responsibilities:Collaborate with the sales and field team to develop engaging content, graphics, and visuals for marketing materials, including proposals and presentations.Utilize Adobe Creative Suite, specifically Photoshop, to design and edit images and graphics for various marketing initiatives.Assist in the creation and maintenance of digital and print marketing materials, ensuring consistency and alignment with brand guidelines.Conduct market research and analysis to identify trends and opportunities for business growth.Assist in creating documents for response to proposals, scope sheets, etc. 
Marketing Assistant Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Graphic Design, or a related field.Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, particularly Photoshop, with a strong portfolio showcasing design skills.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.Strong organizational and time management skills.Previous experience in the construction industry is a plus but not required.Ability to work onsite in Springfield NJ office 
Salary range $50,000 - $75,000 based on experience. Apply today to iWorld Professionals for immediate confidential consideration. 

The salary or compensation shown is not a final offer amount as this may vary based on factors, including but not limited to, experience and geographic location.
iWorld Professionals is an equal opportunity employer and considers employment to qualified applicants regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other consideration made unlawful by federal, state, or local laws.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Marketing Assistant
output_json.summary: Seeking a Marketing Assistant for a client in Springfield, NJ.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Graphic Design, or a related field
optional_skills: Strong familiarity with Adobe Creative Suite
Ability to create compelling documents and business proposals
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Strong organizational and time management skills
Previous experience in the construction industry
soft_skills: Strong organizational and time management skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work onsite in Springfield NJ office
job_responsibilities: Collaborate with the sales and field team to develop engaging content, graphics, and visuals for marketing materials, including proposals and presentations.
Utilize Adobe Creative Suite, specifically Photoshop, to design and edit images and graphics for various marketing initiatives.
Assist in the creation and maintenance of digital and print marketing materials, ensuring consistency and alignment with brand guidelines.
Conduct market research and analysis to identify trends and opportunities for business growth.
Assist in creating documents for response to proposals, scope sheets, etc.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: iWorld Professionals is an equal opportunity employer and considers employment to qualified applicants regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other consideration made unlawful by federal, state, or local laws.
